name: ng-annotate-loader
description: Webpack loader that runs ng-annotate on your bundles

scripts.test-simple: npm run example-simple && cmp examples/simple/annotated-reference.js examples/simple/dist/build.js && echo 'Simple test passed' || exit 123
scripts.test-babel: npm run example-babel && cmp examples/babel/annotated-reference.js examples/babel/dist/build.js && cmp examples/babel/sourcemap-reference.js.map examples/babel/dist/build.js.map && echo 'Babel test passed' || exit 123
scripts.test: npm run test-simple && npm run test-babel

author: Andrey Skladchikov
